name: Handmade Shoes, Baby, Toddler, Girl Soft Soled Booties & Ballet Flats...Pink Sookie
description:
Ross & Rosie
{Pink Sookie} 
Handmade soft soled shoes are comfy, flexible,and very fashionable 

{Materials}
All of Ross & Rosie's soft soled shoes/boots/booties are made with only the finest materials. Designer cottons, silks, and wool felts. I also strive to use responsible materials like eco felts, "faux" leathers, and "fuax" furs. So you may see something very fabulous and fury, but it will be all "faux"...
All shoes/boots/booties are made with a non-slip "faux leather" sole.

{Sizing & Fit}
Please use the following sizing chart to insure proper fit. Measure baby/toddler/girl's feet and add 1/4"-1/2" for desired wiggle & growth. Please measure heel to big toe than add 1/4"-1/2" wiggle/growth room.
Please feel free to convo me on any sizing questions you may have:)

{Baby Shoe sizing Chart}

{1}...0-3months...4"
{2}...3-6months...4.25"
{3}...6-12months...4.75"
{4}...12-18months...5"
{5}...18-24months...5.25"
{6}...24months-2t...5.75"

{Toddler & Girl Shoe sizing Chart}

{7}...5.75"
{8}...6.25"
{9}...6.5"
{10}...6.75"
{11}...7"
{12}...7.5"

{Production & Shipping} 
All items are handmade and handcut. All orders are custom and will be made just for you! Please see shop policies for current production and shipment times.
If you are in a rush or need your order by a specific date please contact me and I will see if I can accomodate your needs 

{info}
Please never leave baby or toddler unsupervised with embellished shoes/boots/booties.

Sizes 9-12 do not have an elastic strap...If you would like the elastic strap please let me know in the "note to seller" section

The fabric placemement will very with each shoe/boot/bootie I make...OOAK:) 

Thanks for stopping by
Ross & Rosie
